full_summary:
# Government Tender Notification

## Request for Proposal: Communication Service Monitor Kit
### Reference Number: WS4229825623

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) is issuing a Request for Proposal (RFP) for the provision of Communication Service Monitor (CSM) Kits on behalf of the Department of Industry (ISED).

### Tender Summary
The ISED's Spectrum and Telecommunications Sector is modernizing its aging radio frequency test and measurement equipment portfolio under the Pulsar program. The objective of this RFP is to procure 30 CSM Kits with optional purchases in option years to monitor and measure technical parameters of radio emissions for radio interference, compliance, and enforcement activities.

### Tender Details
* **Tender Type**: Request for Proposal (RFP)
* **Procurement Method**: Competitive - Open bidding
* **Solicitation Number**: WS4229825623
* **RFP Amendment**: 3
* **Amendment Date**: November 8, 2023
* **Tender Closing Date**: November 7, 2023, at 2:00 PM EST
* **Tender Status**: Expired

### Contract Specifications
* **Goods or Services**: Communication Service Monitor (CSM) Kits
* **Quantity**: 30 Kits
* **Delivery Location**: Ottawa, ON
* **Expected Contract Start Date**: March 7, 2024
* **Expected Contract End Date**: March 29, 2024

### Contact Information
* **Contracting Entity**: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* **Contact Name**: Bucktowar, Siddharth
* **Email**: siddharth.bucktowar@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

### Additional Information
This RFP is subject to the terms and conditions of the Global Trade Agreement (GTA) and the Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA). Proposers must familiarize themselves with the relevant trade agreements and requirements. 

You can view the complete tender notice on the Ariba Discovery website at the following link: https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/17626874?extsite=MTc2MjY4NzRfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==

Please note that the specified deadline for submission of responses is November 7, 2023, at 2:00 PM EST. Any responses submitted after this time will be
